mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.HealthyKnowledge_name as HealthyKnowledgeName ,a.HealthyKnowledge_photo as HealthyKnowledgePhoto ,a.HealthyKnowledge_types as HealthyKnowledgeTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.HealthyKnowledge_content as HealthyKnowledgeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM HealthyKnowledge a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.HealthyKnowledge_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.HealthyKnowledgeName},'%')
and a.HealthyKnowledge_types = #{params.HealthyKnowledgeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.HealthyKnowledge_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.HealthyKnowledgeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
